feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [BUDI-8460] Add New Step to Table Screen Template by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14203
  • allow values to be passed in secrets by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14407

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.5...2.30.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Split columns setting button/content by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14406
  • Honor table and view schema on query by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14351
  • SQS - broken relationship fix by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14413

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.6...2.30.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix for maximum call stack exceeded by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14416
  • Invalid primary display setting (no relationship columns) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14418

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.7...2.30.8

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • "Grid" drag and drop layouts by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14360
  • Tiny fix for memo stores by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14419
  • Fix saving huge amounts of unnecessary data in settings by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14422
  • Bump elliptic from 6.5.4 to 6.5.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14420
  • Search logical operator fixes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14394
  • Fix query conditions on views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14423

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.8...2.31.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ensure autoscreens use a specific component order to look better on old clients by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14429

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.0...2.31.1
